item.title: A Free Password Manager
item.description: For many years, my friends and colleagues used to make fun of lambda people digital security: “People are stupid. They use 12345678 as their main password”. I was smiling and nodding in approbation but deep down I knew that having a pawned mail address and the same weak password on dozens of websites would not make me a poster boy for personal data security. I was feeling guilty about it but I never really had the motivation to dive into it.
